dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Engine oil; Motor oil; Gear oil; Compressor oil; Turbine oil; Hydraulic fluid
Engine oil; Motor oil; Gear oil; Compressor oil; Turbine oil; Hydraulic fluid
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Lubricating oil is a highly refined mineral or synthetic oil designed to reduce friction and wear, provide a sealing effect, protect against corrosion, and cool engine parts. It is commonly used in automotive, industrial, and marine applications, where it undergoes specialized processes to meet required standards and specifications. The quality of lubricating oil depends on its viscosity grade and additive package. The production route involves distillation of crude oil, followed by refining processes such as solvent extraction and hydrocracking. This product is often available as a consumption mix to consumers, or as a bulk product at the production plant.
润滑油是一种高度精制的矿物或合成油，旨在减少摩擦和磨损，提供密封效果，防止腐蚀，并冷却发动机部件。它通常用于汽车、工业和船舶应用，在这些应用中，它经历专门的过程以满足所需的标准和规格。润滑油的质量取决于其粘度等级和添加剂配方。其生产路线包括原油的蒸馏，以及溶剂提取和加氢裂化等精炼过程。此产品常以消费者使用的混合物形式提供，或在生产工厂以散装产品形式存在。
